artist: Designer: Charles G. Shepard; Designer: Peter Adams; Manufacturer: Book of Knowledge (Grolier, Inc.)
description: metal brick shape base with black horse on top; horse's head moves when coin is placed in container in front of horse (coin slot) and lever at back is pulled
inscription:
Inscription

on sides, in gold: [TRICK PONY]
on head end, in gold: [BANK]
on bottom: [REPRODUCED FROM/ ORIGINAL/ IN COLLECTION OF/ THE BOOK/ OF KNOWLEDGE]
title: "Trick Pony" (reproduction) mechanical bank
